hero.title: Volleyball Statistics for Dummies
hero.subtitle: Track, analyze, and improve your team's performance with simple analytics

matchTracking.title: Match Tracking
matchTracking.content: Track serves, attacks, blocks, and more during live matches with our intuitive interface.

teamManagement.title: Team Management
teamManagement.content: Manage multiple teams, player rosters, and track individual performance metrics.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.content: Analyze team and player statistics with comprehensive charts and reports.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.content: Export statistics to CSV/PDF and share match results with team members.
